bibl.title: Lost in Tradition. Papyrus Commentaries on Comedies and Tragedies of Unknown Authorship. English Translation by Johanna HANINK. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - Examines the surviving exemplars of hypomnemata to dramatic adespota, investigating certain quantitative data, these exemplars' chronological distribution, as well as their characteristics as books.

bibl.title: Fragments of the Past. Ancient Scholarship and Greek Papyri

bibl.seg: PERRONE Serena, Lost in Tradition. Papyrus Commentaries on Comedies and Tragedies of Unknown Authorship. English Translation by Johanna HANINK. Avec résumé en anglais.
Franco MONTANARI and Serena PERRONE (Edd.), Fragments of the Past. Ancient Scholarship and Greek Papyri = Trends in Classics 1 (2009) 2, pp. 203-240, 2 tabl.

Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - Examines the surviving exemplars of hypomnemata to dramatic adespota, investigating certain quantitative data, these exemplars' chronological distribution, as well as their characteristics as books.
